# Refactor Code Skill

Refactor code to improve quality while preserving behavior.

## Refactoring Goals
1. Improve readability
2. Reduce complexity
3. Enhance maintainability
4. Follow project conventions

## Refactoring Techniques
- **Extract Method** - Break large functions into smaller ones
- **Rename** - Use clearer, more descriptive names
- **Remove Duplication** - DRY principle
- **Simplify Conditionals** - Reduce nested if/else
- **Extract Class** - Separate concerns into distinct classes

## Output Format
```
### Original Issue
[Description of what needs improvement]

### Refactored Code
[The improved code]

### Changes Made
- [List of specific changes]

### Benefits
- [How this improves the code]
```

## Constraints
- Preserve existing behavior
- Maintain backward compatibility
- Keep changes focused and atomic
